item.title: 苹果上调 iPhone、Mac 以旧换新抵扣价，新增支持华为小米等机型
item.guid: 苹果上调-iPhone、Mac-以旧换新抵扣价，新增支持华为小米等机型
item.description:
Yesterday, Apple's official website updated the trade-in values for devices such as iPhone, iPad, and Mac, and for the first time included models from brands like Huawei and Xiaomi in the trade-in program. 昨天，苹果官网更新了 iPhone、iPad、Mac 等设备的以旧换新折抵价，并首次将华为、小米等品牌的机型纳入折抵范围。

Regarding specific trade-in amounts: 在具体折抵金额方面：

    iPhone 16 Pro Max in China can be traded in for up to 5800 yuan, and iPhone 15 Pro Max for up to 4300 yuan;

    iPad Pro can be traded in for up to 5800 yuan, and iPad Air for up to 3500 yuan;

    MacBook Pro can be traded in for up to 6050 yuan, and Mac Pro for 14000 yuan to 17100 yuan.

Apple's official website also listed trade-in prices for some other brand models, including: 苹果官网还列举了一些其他品牌机型的折抵价格，包括：

    Huawei Mate X5 can be traded in for up to 2850 yuan;

    Huawei Mate 70 Pro+ can be offset by up to 2750 yuan;

    OPPO Find X8 Pro can be offset by up to 1700 yuan;

    vivo iQOO 13 can be offset by up to 1600 yuan;

    Xiaomi 15 Pro can be offset by up to 1600 yuan.

Apple's official website shows that the trade-in value is only an estimated price, and the actual amount depends on the device's condition, configuration, launch year, and sales region, and is only available to users aged 18 or above. 苹果官网显示，折抵金额仅为预估价，实际金额取决于设备状况、配置、推出年份及发售地区，且仅限年满 18 周岁以上用户参与。

This service is provided by Apple's partners, allowing users to trade in their existing devices for new Apple products. In addition, Apple's "iPhone Upgrade Program" allows consumers to upgrade to a new device with a trade-in discount of at least 50% of the original purchase price, from the 3rd month to the end of the 15th month after purchasing an eligible iPhone. 该服务由苹果的合作伙伴提供，用户可将现有设备折抵购买新的苹果产品。此外，苹果的「年年焕新计划」允许消费者在购买符合条件的 iPhone 第 3 个月起至第 15 个月末期间，以原购买价格至少 50% 的折抵优惠升级换购新机。

item.title: 西贝人事与关店风波持续发酵，罗永浩贾国龙再打口水仗
item.guid: 西贝人事与关店风波持续发酵，罗永浩贾国龙再打口水仗
item.description:
Yesterday, after Jia Guolong posted on his WeChat Moments responding to numerous store closures, stating that he "doesn't understand public relations, can't quibble," and was "maliciously confused by internet celebrities," Luo Yonghao once again commented on the Xibei incident: "I have never seen a company go out of business just because it was slandered, without making any other mistakes." 昨天，在贾国龙朋友圈发文回应大量关店、表示自己「不懂公关、不会诡辩」、「被网红恶意混淆」后，罗永浩再次就西贝相关事件发文：「我这辈子也没有见过一个企业没犯别的错误，仅仅是因为被黑，就能倒闭的。」

He believes that business operating decisions should be more cautious, otherwise "all of this might be predestined." The related topic "Luo Yonghao Responds to Xibei Store Closures" once topped Weibo's hot search. 他认为，企业经营决策应更谨慎，否则「这一切可能都是注定的」。相关话题「罗永浩回应西贝闭店」一度登上微博热搜。

Subsequently, Jia Guolong stated that he would release a comprehensive response to Luo Yonghao's "serious defamation and slander" via his personal account at 10 PM, but around 9:50 PM, both Luo Yonghao's and Jia Guolong's personal Weibo accounts were muted. 随后，贾国龙表示将在 22 时通过个人账号发布对罗永浩「重大污蔑诽谤」的全面回应，但在 21 时 50 分左右，罗永浩与贾国龙的个人微博账号均被禁言。

After his account was muted, Jia Guolong used the "Xibei People's Voice" account to publish his response, accusing Luo Yonghao of "maliciously inciting public sentiment," stating that "during the cyberbullying orchestrated by Luo Yonghao last year, Xibei store staff nationwide were cursed, beaten, and forced to kneel dozens of times." He also expressed willingness to go with Luo to relevant departments to verify whether there were reports to the police or cross-provincial arrests. 在账号被禁言后，贾国龙转由「西贝人心声」账号发布回应内容，指责罗永浩「恶意煽动公共情绪」，「去年罗永浩制造的网暴期间，全国西贝门店服务员被骂被打被逼下跪数十次。」并表示愿意与其共同前往相关部门核查是否存在报警或跨省抓捕等情况。

Sina Weibo CEO Wang Gaofei (@laiquzhijian) subsequently posted, citing content from the Cyberspace Administration of China's "Negative List for Online Celebrity Account Behavior" regarding "organizing fights and debates," implying that the muting of both accounts was related to such rules. 新浪微博 CEO 王高飞（@来去之间）随后发文援引网信办《网络名人账号行为负面清单》中「组织约架论战」相关内容，暗示双方账号被禁言与此类规则相关。

According to Dahe Daily, after Jia Guolong released his response, Luo Yonghao replied in his WeChat Moments, saying, "Okay, he won. After a day of commotion, I can finally get back to serious business." 据《大河报》，贾国龙发布回应后，罗永浩在朋友圈回应称，「好吧，他赢了，闹腾了一天，终于可以忙正事去了。」

Currently, the content posted by Jia Guolong is no longer visible, and the "Xibei People's Voice" account has been cleared. 目前，贾国龙发布的内容已不可见，「西贝人心声」账号已清空。

In addition, according to Bianews, yesterday, Xibei's VP of Public Relations, Song Xuan, confirmed her resignation on WeChat Moments. Notably, her departure time was earlier than founder Jia Guolong's recent multiple public statements on WeChat Moments. 此外，据鞭牛士报道，昨天，西贝公关副总裁宋宣在朋友圈确认已离职。值得注意的是，其离职时间早于创始人贾国龙近期在朋友圈的多次公开发声。

Song Xuan stated on WeChat Moments, "I love Xibei, and I love Jia Guolong," calling herself "a Xibei person forever." 宋宣在朋友圈表示「我爱西贝，也爱贾国龙」，称自己「永远是西贝人」。

Jia Guolong later responded, stating that Song Xuan had endured immense pressure during last year's prepared dishes public opinion incident, and emphasized that all final decisions were made by Jia himself, unrelated to the partner H&H or Song Xuan. 贾国龙随后回应称，宋宣在去年预制菜舆论事件中承受了巨大压力，并强调所有最终决策均由贾本人作出，与合作方华与华及宋宣无关。

Furthermore, Jia Guolong also posted to vindicate Hua Shan, the founder of H&H, emphasizing that Xibei's collaboration with H&H has lasted for ten years, primarily focusing on brand building and management consulting, and is unrelated to the current public opinion controversy. 此外，贾国龙还发文为华与华创始人华杉正名，强调西贝与华与华合作已持续十年，主要聚焦品牌建设与经营咨询，与此次舆论争议无关。

He mentioned that during the prepared dishes controversy in September last year, Hua Shan suffered cyberbullying for publicly supporting Xibei, "At that time, he tearfully advised me not to respond, but I didn't listen." 他提到，在去年 9 月的预制菜风波中，华杉因公开支持西贝而遭遇网暴， 「当时他流着泪劝我不要回应，是我不听」 。

Previously, Jia Guolong confirmed that Xibei would close 102 stores nationwide at once, affecting approximately 4,000 employees. The closure ratio accounts for about 30% of the total number of stores, mainly concentrated in first and second-tier cities, with 19 in Shanghai, and 10, 8, and 5 in Beijing, Shenzhen, and Guangzhou respectively. 此前，贾国龙确认西贝将一次性关闭全国 102 家门店，涉及约 4000 名员工，关店比例约占总门店数三成，且主要集中在一、二线城市，其中上海 19 家，北京、深圳、广州分别关闭 10、8、5 家。

Jia Guolong stated that all departing employees' salaries would be paid "to the last penny," and stored-value cards could continue to be used at other stores or be refunded. 贾国龙表示，所有离职员工工资将「一分钱不会差」，储值卡可在其他门店继续使用或办理退款。

item.title: ChatGPT 广告来了，首批在美国测试
item.guid: ChatGPT-广告来了，首批在美国测试
item.description:
Today, OpenAI announced that it will launch ad testing within ChatGPT in the United States in the coming weeks, targeting logged-in adult users in the US, covering the free version and the low-cost subscription plan ChatGPT Go. 今天，OpenAI 宣布将在未来几周内于美国启动 ChatGPT 内的广告测试，面向美国已登录的成年用户，覆盖免费版与低价订阅方案 ChatGPT Go。

OpenAI stated that ads will appear at the bottom of responses and will be clearly labeled, without affecting the content of ChatGPT's answers. Higher-tier subscription levels such as Plus, Pro, Business, and Enterprise will continue to remain ad-free. OpenAI 表示，广告将出现在回答底部，并以清晰标注的形式呈现，不会影响 ChatGPT 的回答内容。而 Plus、Pro、Business 与 Enterprise 等更高阶订阅层级仍将保持无广告体验。

OpenAI also officially announced today that ChatGPT Go is now fully available in all regions where ChatGPT is offered, with a monthly fee of $8 (approximately 55.74 RMB). OpenAI 今天还官宣，ChatGPT Go 在今天起扩展至为所有提供 ChatGPT 的地区全面开放，月费为 8 美元（约合 55.74 元人民币）。

Go users can use messaging, image generation, file uploads, and memory features, and will also see ads during the testing period. Go 用户可使用消息交流、图像生成、文件上传与记忆功能，同样会在测试期间看到广告。

CNBC reported that OpenAI signed infrastructure agreements worth over $1.4 trillion in 2025, and CEO Sam Altman previously stated that the company's annualized revenue last year was close to $20 billion. CNBC 报道指出，OpenAI 在 2025 年签署了超过 1.4 万亿美元的基础设施协议，CEO Sam Altman 曾表示公司去年年化收入已接近 200 亿美元。

The advertising business is seen as an important way to supplement its high computing power investment, similar to the path of tech giants like Google and Meta, which rely on advertising models. 广告业务被视为补充其高额算力投入的重要方式，与 Google、Meta 等依赖广告模式的科技巨头路径类似。

OpenAI emphasized that its advertising strategy will adhere to five principles, including "mission alignment," "response independence," "conversational privacy," "choice and control," and "long-term value." OpenAI 强调广告策略将遵循五项原则，包括「使命一致性」「回答独立性」「对话隐私」「选择与控制」以及「长期价值」。

The company promises not to sell user data, ads will not appear near sensitive topics such as politics, health, and mental health, and users under 18 will not see ads. 公司承诺不会出售用户数据，广告不会出现在政治、健康、心理健康等敏感话题附近，未满 18 岁用户也不会看到广告。

During the testing phase, users can see why they are seeing a particular ad, turn off ads, and submit feedback. OpenAI stated that it will continue to optimize the presentation based on user feedback, while also exploring more interactive ad formats, such as allowing users to directly ask questions to ads to assist in decision-making. 在测试阶段，用户可查看为何看到某条广告、关闭广告并提交反馈。OpenAI 表示将根据用户意见持续优化呈现方式，同时探索更具互动性的广告形式，例如允许用户直接向广告提问，以辅助决策。

Altman has previously publicly expressed caution about the advertising model but also admitted that the company might try advertising in the future. Altman 曾在过去公开表达对广告模式的谨慎态度，但也承认公司可能在未来尝试广告。

item.title: 消息称 Jony Ive 成苹果从 OpenAI 转向 Google Gemini 的导火索
item.guid: 消息称-Jony-Ive-成苹果从-OpenAI-转向-Google-Gemini-的导火索
item.description:
According to the Financial Times, multiple sources familiar with the matter said that OpenAI "consciously decided not to become Apple's custom model provider" last autumn, instead focusing on building its own AI device, hoping to achieve a leapfrog lead in the next round of hardware competition. 据《金融时报》报道，多位知情人士称，OpenAI 曾在去年秋季「有意识地决定不成为苹果的定制模型提供方」，转而专注于打造自己的 AI 设备，以期在下一轮硬件竞争中实现跨越式领先。

The report pointed out that this device is a "new hardware form" designed by former Apple chief design officer Jony Ive, and is seen by outsiders as a key step for OpenAI to challenge the smartphone paradigm. 报道指出，这一设备正是由前苹果首席设计官 Jony Ive 主导设计的「全新硬件形态」，被外界视为 OpenAI 试图挑战智能手机范式的关键一步。

Analysts pointed out that Ive's involvement changed the relationship structure between Apple and OpenAI. 分析人士指出，Ive 的加入改变了苹果与 OpenAI 的关系结构。

Gene Munster of investment firm Deepwater Asset Management stated that OpenAI is trying to create a product that "could compete with the iPhone," and Ive's involvement further strengthened this direction, which also prompted Apple to lean towards choosing Google for model cooperation. 证券投资公司 Deepwater Asset Management 的 Gene Munster 表示，OpenAI 试图打造「可能与 iPhone 竞争」的产品，而 Ive 的加盟更强化了这一方向，这也促使苹果在模型合作上更倾向于选择 Google。

After Ive left Apple, his design company LoveFrom has maintained cooperation with tech giants, but the hardware project with OpenAI is considered his most strategically significant product endeavor since the iPhone and Apple Watch. Ive 离开苹果后，其设计公司 LoveFrom 一直保持与科技巨头的合作，但与 OpenAI 的硬件项目被认为是其继 iPhone、Apple Watch 之后最具战略意义的产品尝试。

Although the device details remain highly confidential, multiple sources have confirmed its positioning as an entirely new category, rather than an extension of traditional smartphones. 尽管该设备细节仍高度保密，但多方消息均确认其定位为全新类别，而非传统智能手机延伸。

Within Apple, although Ive's influence is no longer present, his design philosophy and product thinking still profoundly impact Apple's hardware roadmap. Now, his role at OpenAI has become an external variable in Apple's AI strategic layout, forcing it to re-evaluate potential competitive relationships when choosing partners. 在苹果内部，Ive 的影响力虽已不在，但其设计哲学与产品思维仍深刻影响着苹果的硬件路线。如今，他在 OpenAI 的角色反而成为苹果 AI 战略布局中的外部变量，使其在选择合作伙伴时不得不重新评估潜在竞争关系。

item.title: 曝小米、OPPO、vivo、传音下调今年出货预期，存储涨价压力全面传导
item.guid: 曝小米、OPPO、vivo、传音下调今年出货预期，存储涨价压力全面传导
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, affected by the continuous rise in upstream storage prices, several smartphone manufacturers have recently lowered their full-year shipment forecasts. Xiaomi and OPPO's reductions exceeded 20%, vivo's was nearly 15%, and Transsion's dropped below 70 million units, mainly concentrated in mid-to-low-end and overseas models. 据界面新闻报道，受上游存储价格持续上涨影响，多家智能手机厂商近期下调了今年的整机出货预期，其中小米、OPPO 的下调幅度超过 20%，vivo 下调近 15%，传音则降至 7000 万台以下，主要集中在中低端与海外机型。

Multiple supply chain sources confirmed to Jiemian News that smartphone manufacturers usually adopt a "over-reporting strategy" to secure upstream resources, so original manufacturers have not received reduction notices consistent with the aforementioned magnitudes. 多位供应链人士向界面新闻确认，手机厂商为了争取上游资源，通常会采取「多报策略」，因此原厂并未收到与上述幅度一致的下调通知。

An employee from an original storage manufacturer stated that the volume reported by manufacturers to them is similar to last year's actual shipments, with only a slight decrease. For example, Transsion's reported forecast still exceeds 100 million units. He believes that the claim of a "20% reduction" is exaggerated, and the original manufacturer estimates the actual reduction to be about 10%. 一位来自存储原厂的员工表示，厂商报给他们的量与去年实际出货相近，仅略有减少，例如传音报出的预期仍超过 1 亿台。他认为「20% 下调」的说法偏夸张，原厂判断实际减少幅度约为 10%。

Starting this year, original manufacturers such as Samsung, Micron, and Hynix have adopted a pricing strategy for mobile phone customers that is synchronized with the server market, to prevent mobile phone manufacturers from being unable to bear the cost pressure. Affected by AI demand pushing up server-side storage prices, supply shortages have intensified, and the pressure of price increases faced by mobile phone manufacturers has become unavoidable. 从今年开始，三星、美光、海力士等原厂对手机客户采取与服务器市场同步的价格策略，以避免手机厂商无法承受成本压力。受 AI 需求推高服务器端存储价格影响，供应链短缺加剧，手机厂商面临的涨价压力已难以避免。

Korean media previously reported that Samsung Electronics and Hynix plan to increase server DRAM prices by 60%–70% in the first quarter of this year compared to the fourth quarter of last year. Supply chain sources said that this increase is not the final plan, but mobile phone manufacturers will be affected, and the increase will not be higher than that for servers. 韩国媒体此前报道，三星电子与海力士计划在今年第一季度将服务器 DRAM 价格较去年第四季度提升 60%–70%。供应链人士称，这一涨幅并非最终方案，但手机厂商将受到连带影响，涨幅不会高于服务器端。

Previously, a report from Counterpoint Research pointed out that the storage market has entered a 'super bull market,' with conditions even surpassing the 2018 peak. 此前，Counterpoint Research 的报告指出，存储市场已进入「超级牛市」，行情甚至超过 2018 年高点。

Driven by continuous AI and server demand, suppliers' bargaining power has reached a historical high. Storage prices are expected to rise by 40%–50% in Q4 2025, another 40%–50% in Q1 this year, and are projected to continue rising by about 20% in Q2. 在 AI 与服务器需求持续拉动下，供应商议价能力达到历史高位。预计 2025 年第四季度存储价格将上涨 40%–50%，今年第一季度再涨 40%–50%，第二季度预计继续上涨约 20%。

Under cost pressure, OPPO's recent integration of realme and OnePlus businesses is seen by the industry as one of the important measures to cope with rising storage prices. 在成本压力下，OPPO 近期整合 realme 与一加业务，被业内视为应对存储涨价的重要举措之一。

On the other hand, leading manufacturers such as Apple and Samsung have not been significantly affected; while manufacturers like Huawei, Lenovo, and Honor are seeking to expand their market share during the price increase cycle. 另一方面，苹果、三星等头部厂商未受到明显影响；华为、联想、荣耀等厂商则在涨价周期中寻求扩大份额。

Leveraging its localized supply chain advantage, Huawei is internally discussing lowering the prices of its Pura, nova, and Enjoy series to further seize market share; Honor still maintains its goal of 15% market share in China this year. 华为凭借供应链国产化优势，内部正讨论下调 Pura、nova、畅享等系列售价，以进一步抢占市场；荣耀仍维持今年在中国区 15% 份额的目标。

As non-leading manufacturers find it difficult to prioritize obtaining storage supply, Lenovo has chosen to raise its shipment expectations to fill some gaps in the North American carrier market. 由于非头部厂商难以优先获得存储供应，联想选择调高出货预期，以填补北美运营商市场的部分空缺。

Omdia analyst Liu Yixuan (Amber Liu) stated that the smartphone industry is shifting from a growth logic centered on shipments to a stage of value reconstruction. The key this year is no longer how many units manufacturers can sell, but rather what configurations and prices consumers are willing to pay for. Omdia 分析师刘艺璇（Amber Liu）表示，智能手机行业正从以出货量为核心的增长逻辑转向价值重构阶段。今年的关键不再是厂商能卖出多少台，而是消费者愿意为怎样的配置与价格买单。

She expects DRAM and NAND prices to remain high or even continue to rise, and some emerging market manufacturers will find it difficult to fully absorb the costs, thus adjusting this year's global smartphone market forecast from moderate growth to a decline of about 1%. 她预计 DRAM 与 NAND 价格将维持高位甚至继续上涨，部分新兴市场厂商难以完全消化成本，因此将今年全球智能手机市场预期从温和增长调整为约 1% 的下滑。

item.title: AI 热潮推高需求，台积电毛利率突破 62% 创新高
item.guid: AI-热潮推高需求，台积电毛利率突破-62%-创新高
item.description:
According to Tencent Tech, TSMC recently released its Q4 last year financial report, with key indicators such as revenue, net profit, and gross margin all exceeding expectations. Management also expressed strong confidence in this year's growth during the earnings call. 据腾讯科技报道，近日，台积电公布去年第四季度财报，营收、净利、毛利率等核心指标全面超预期，管理层在业绩会上亦释放出对今年增长的强烈信心。

    Revenue in the fourth quarter of last year reached US$33.73 billion, a year-on-year increase of 25.5%; net profit was US$16.297 billion, a year-on-year increase of 40.2%; full-year revenue reached US$122.42 billion, a year-on-year increase of 35.9%;

    In terms of gross margin, TSMC reached 62.3% in the fourth quarter of last year, exceeding the previous guidance upper limit;

    Regarding product platforms, HPC (High-Performance Computing) continues to be TSMC's strongest growth engine, with its contribution to revenue expected to remain above 50% in the short term. TSMC also raised its compound annual growth rate forecast for AI accelerator revenue from 2024 to 2029 to the mid-to-high 50% range;

    In terms of process technology, in the fourth quarter of last year, 7nm and below processes contributed 77% of the company's wafer revenue, with 5nm accounting for 35% and 3nm for 28%;

    Regarding expenditures, full-year capital expenditure reached US$40.9 billion, and is expected to further increase to US$52 billion to US$56 billion this year.

The report also specifically mentioned that TSMC's quarterly revenue of US$33.73 billion, converted to RMB, is equivalent to 234.977 billion yuan (with 1 US dollar exchanging for approximately 6.966 RMB), meaning that for every second the second hand moves, nearly 30,000 yuan is earned . 报道还特别提到，台积电 337.3 亿美元的季度营收，换算成人民币相当于 2349.77 亿元（1 美元兑换约人民币 6.966 元），也就是说 秒针每走 1 秒，就赚了近 3 万元 。

During the conference call, TSMC Chairman C.C. Wei stated that based on the company's leading advantages in advanced processes, specialty technologies, and advanced packaging, TSMC expects to achieve a year-on-year revenue growth of nearly 30% this year. If calculated this way, full-year revenue is expected to reach US$159.1 billion, approximately 1.1 trillion RMB. 在电话会议中，台积电董事长魏哲家表示，基于先进制程、特殊工艺及先进封装的领先优势，公司预计今年营收将实现接近 30% 的同比增长。若按此推算，全年营收有望达到 1591 亿美元，约合人民币 1.1 万亿元。

Management emphasized that as long as capacity utilization remains high and depreciation of older nodes is completed, there is still room for gross margin improvement. 管理层强调，只要产能利用率保持高位、旧节点折旧完成，毛利率仍有提升空间。

Advanced process technology remains the core driver of TSMC's growth. With the mass production of Nvidia's Rubin architecture and major customers like Apple adopting 3nm and future 2nm processes, the revenue contribution of 3nm is expected to increase rapidly. 先进制程依旧是台积电增长的核心驱动力。随着英伟达 Rubin 架构量产、苹果等大客户导入 3nm 与未来的 2nm，3nm 的营收占比预计将快速提升。

Management pointed out that the expansion of advanced packaging capacity such as 2nm, A16, and CoWoS will continue to drive up investment scale. 管理层指出，2nm、A16 以及 CoWoS 等先进封装产能扩建将持续推高投入规模。

In terms of global capacity layout, Taiwan, China, remains TSMC's core technology hub, with 2nm capacity advancing at multiple points in Hsinchu and Kaohsiung; the Arizona wafer fab in the United States has entered high-volume production, with the second fab brought forward to mass production in the second half of 2027; Japan's Kumamoto Fab 1 has begun mass production, and construction of Fab 2 has started; a special process fab in Germany is also underway. 在全球产能布局上，中国台湾仍是台积电最核心的技术枢纽，2nm 产能正在新竹与高雄多点推进；美国亚利桑那州的晶圆厂已进入高产量生产阶段，第二座厂提前至 2027 年下半年量产；日本熊本一厂已量产，二厂建设启动；德国特殊工艺厂亦在推进中。

Regarding the technology roadmap, TSMC confirmed that 2nm has entered mass production in multiple locations in Taiwan, China, in the fourth quarter of last year, with stable yields, and will enter a rapid ramp-up phase this year. 技术路线方面，台积电确认 2nm 已于去年第四季度在中国台湾多地量产，良率稳定，今年将进入快速爬坡期。

The enhanced N2P is expected to enter mass production in the second half of this year, while A16, which uses Super Power Rail (SPR) technology, will also enter mass production in the second half of this year, primarily targeting top-tier HPC and AI customers. 增强版 N2P 预计今年下半年量产，而采用超级电源轨（SPR）技术的 A16 则将在今年下半年量产，主要面向顶级 HPC 与 AI 客户。

Addressing analysts' questions about the authenticity of AI demand, the competitive landscape, and power supply, C.C. Wei emphasized that AI has become an integral part of enterprises' core business processes, and demand has long-term sustainability; 面对分析师关于 AI 需求真实性、竞争格局、电力供应等问题，魏哲家强调，AI 已成为企业核心业务流程的一部分，需求具备长期可持续性；

Global data center power planning is forward-looking, with the current bottleneck still in chip supply rather than power; advanced process competition is a 'marathon,' and TSMC has long-term advantages in technology, yield, and customer ecosystem. 全球数据中心的电力规划具备前瞻性，当前瓶颈仍在芯片供给而非电力；先进制程竞争是一场「马拉松」，台积电在技术、良率与客户生态上具备长期优势。

Management also pointed out that capital expenditure will significantly increase in the next three years to meet the enormous demand for advanced processes and packaging in the AI era. TSMC expects its overall revenue compound annual growth rate to approach 25% over the next five years. 管理层亦指出，未来三年资本支出将显著攀升，以满足 AI 时代对先进制程与封装的巨大需求。台积电预计未来五年整体营收复合增长率将接近 25%。

item.title: 继多国政府后，日本也加入对 Grok 的审查
item.guid: 继多国政府后，日本也加入对-Grok-的审查
item.description:
According to The Japan Times, the Japanese government announced yesterday that it would launch a review of Elon Musk's AI service Grok, after the chatbot was accused of generating and disseminating sexualized images without consent. 据《日本时报》报道，日本政府昨天宣布将对埃隆 · 马斯克旗下人工智能服务 Grok 展开审查，原因是该聊天机器人被指在未经同意的情况下生成并传播性化图像。

Japan's Cabinet Office has requested social media platform X to strengthen security measures and restrict Grok's related functional output. In January this year, Economic Security Minister Kimi Onoda stated at a regular press conference that the government had submitted a written inquiry to X, requesting an explanation of specific measures to prevent deepfakes, privacy infringement, and intellectual property violations. 日本内阁府已要求社交平台 X 加强安全措施，限制 Grok 的相关功能输出。今年 1 月，经济安全大臣小野田纪美在例行记者会上表示，政府已向 X 提交书面质询，要求说明防止深度伪造及侵犯隐私、知识产权的具体措施。

She emphasized that if the problem is not improved, all possible legal means are under consideration. 她强调，如果问题得不到改善，所有可能的法律手段都在考虑范围内。

Grok has been criticized this month by users and governments of multiple countries due to concerns over generating sexualized photos and child protection. Regulatory bodies in the United States, India, Malaysia, Indonesia, Ireland, the United Kingdom, France, and Australia, among others, have recently launched investigations, with Indonesia and Malaysia having already implemented temporary bans on Grok. Grok 在本月已因生成性化照片和未成年人保护担忧而遭到用户及多国政府批评，美国、印度、马来西亚、印尼、爱尔兰、英国、法国及澳大利亚等多国监管机构近期均已启动调查，其中印尼与马来西亚已对 Grok 实施临时封禁。

Subsequently, xAI announced further tightening of Grok's image generation features on social media platform X, prohibiting all users from generating or editing sexually suggestive images based on real people, and limiting related features to paid subscribers. 随后，xAI 宣布进一步收紧 Grok 在社交平台 X 上的图像生成功能，禁止所有用户基于真实人物生成或编辑带有性暗示的图像，并将相关功能限定为付费订阅者可用。

However, Kimi Onoda pointed out that the problem has not been completely resolved, and Japan may request further rectification. She also emphasized that the problem lies not with AI itself, but with its usage, describing it as 'like a knife that can be used for cooking or to cause harm.' 然而，小野田纪美指出，问题仍未彻底解决，日本可能会要求进一步整改。她同时强调，问题不在于人工智能本身，而在于使用方式，形容其如同「刀具既可用于烹饪，也可能造成伤害」。

Japan's AI law, formally implemented last year, does not set out penalty clauses, with the government primarily addressing violations through investigations and guidance. Policy discussions focus on user education, labeling whether images have been tampered with, and other directions, and the Cabinet Office is also coordinating with the Ministry of Justice, the National Police Agency, and the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications on possible further measures. 日本去年正式实施的 AI 法律并未设定处罚条款，政府主要通过调查和指导来应对违规行为。政策讨论集中在用户教育、标注图像是否被篡改等方向，内阁府也正与司法省、警察厅及总务省协调可能的进一步措施。

item.title: 💡 Anthropic 新研究：AI 重塑不同岗位，影响远比想象更复杂
item.guid: 💡-Anthropic-新研究：AI-重塑不同岗位，影响远比想象更复杂
item.description:
According to Fortune, Anthropic's latest research shows that AI's impact on different professions is rapidly diverging, and its reshaping of the labor market is far more complex than the simple narrative of 'will AI take away jobs?' 据《财富》报道，Anthropic 最新发布的研究显示，AI 对不同职业的影响正在快速分化，其对劳动力市场的重塑远比「AI 会不会夺走工作」这一简单叙事更为复杂。

The research is based on usage data from Anthropic's own chatbot, Claude, attempting to present in a more quantitative way how users collaborate with AI, delegate tasks in real work scenarios, and the model's success rate in different tasks. 该研究基于 Anthropic 自家聊天机器人 Claude 的使用数据，试图以更量化的方式呈现用户在真实工作场景中如何与 AI 协作、委派任务，以及模型在不同任务中的成功率。

Anthropic economist Peter McCrory stated that this research began last year, with the core goal of understanding how AI, as a general-purpose technology, will affect various professions. He pointed out that AI's impact shows clear job differences: Anthropic 经济学家 Peter McCrory 表示，这项研究始于去年，核心目标是理解作为通用技术的 AI 将如何影响各类职业。他指出，AI 的影响呈现出明显的岗位差异：

Professionals such as radiologists and therapists can use AI to handle time-consuming tasks, thereby dedicating more time to communicating with patients; while roles like data entry, IT support, and travel agents may experience a 'skill degradation' trend as tasks are simplified.

The research also emphasized that human collaboration and supervision remain indispensable in complex tasks, and AI is more like a tool to enhance the productivity of high-skilled jobs, rather than a replacement. McCrory pointed out that the adoption rate of AI in the United States this year has surpassed most mainstream technologies over the past century, and regions with low usage are rapidly catching up. 研究还强调，人类协作与监督在复杂任务中仍不可或缺，AI 更像是提升高技能岗位生产力的工具，而非替代者。McCrory 指出，今年 AI 在美国的普及速度已超过过去一个世纪的多数主流技术，且低使用率地区正在迅速追赶。

The report shows that Claude's coverage of tasks continues to expand, with 44% of jobs now able to use AI in at least a quarter of their tasks, a significant increase from 36% in the previous report. 报告显示，Claude 能覆盖的任务范围持续扩大，目前已有 44% 的岗位可在至少四分之一的任务中使用 AI，相比上一期报告的 36% 明显提升。

McCrory believes that as Claude gains more actionable capabilities, "delegation" will become an important skill in the future workplace. He mentioned that academic research has shown that people with stronger management skills can gain higher value from large models. He himself is increasingly entrusting complex tasks to Claude. McCrory 认为，随着 Claude 具备更多可执行操作的能力，「委派能力」将成为未来职场的重要技能。他提到，学术研究已显示具备更强管理能力的人能从大模型中获得更高价值。他本人也越来越多地将复杂任务交由 Claude 完成。

When discussing the future, McCrory stated that the industry is still in a highly uncertain phase, but Anthropic will continue to open-source relevant data to help researchers and policymakers better understand the potential impact of AI. 在谈及未来时，McCrory 表示行业仍处于高度不确定阶段，但 Anthropic 将持续开源相关数据，帮助研究者与政策制定者更清晰地理解 AI 的潜在影响。

item.title: 支付宝发布中国首个 AI 商业协议 ACT，实现「一句话就能买奶茶」
item.guid: 支付宝发布中国首个-AI-商业协议-ACT，实现「一句话就能买奶茶」
item.description:
Yesterday, Alipay, in collaboration with partners such as Qianwen App, Taobao Flash Sale, Rokid, Damai, and Alibaba Cloud Bailian, officially released the ACT Protocol (Agentic Commerce Trust Protocol). This is China's first open technical protocol framework designed for Agent commercial needs. 昨天，支付宝联合千问 App、淘宝闪购、Rokid、大麦、阿里云百炼等伙伴，正式发布 ACT 协议（Agentic Commerce Trust Protocol，智能体商业信任协议）。这是中国首个面向 Agent 商业需求设计的开放技术协议框架。

The protocol aims to create a 'common language' for the collaboration between AI and service platforms such as e-commerce and food delivery, solving the challenge of AI executing tasks across terminals and systems. 该协议旨在为 AI 与电商、外卖等服务平台的协同打造一套「通用语言」，解决 AI 跨终端、跨系统执行任务的难题。

Taking Qianwen App as an example, under the ACT protocol framework, users only need to issue the command 'Help me order a pearl milk tea', and the AI can intelligently recommend products based on location, compare prices, and redeem coupons. 以千问 App 为例，在 ACT 协议框架下，用户只需发出「帮我点杯珍珠奶茶」指令，AI 即可基于位置智能推荐商品、比价并核销优惠券。

After the user clicks 'Select it' and confirms Alipay payment, the transaction can be completed. The shopping process proceeds in a conversational manner, eliminating the need to jump between different apps. 用户点击「选它」并确认支付宝付款后，即可完成交易，购物流程以对话式推进，无需在不同 App 间跳转。

To address authorization and security issues in AI operations, the ACT protocol has established four core infrastructures: 'Delegation Authorization Domain', 'Commercial Interaction Domain', 'Payment Service Domain', and 'Trust Service Domain'. 为解决 AI 操作中的授权与安全问题，ACT 协议搭建了「委托授权域」、「商业交互域」、「支付服务域」、「信任服务域」四大核心基础设施。

The protocol stipulates that AI only assumes the role of order execution, and the payment process is always led by the user or self-authorized. Currently, the protocol offers two payment modes: 协议规定，AI 仅承担下单执行角色，付款环节始终由用户主导或自主授权。目前，该协议提供两种付款模式：

    Instant Payment : Applicable to high-frequency scenarios such as food delivery and shopping, where users interact with AI in real-time and confirm payment;

    Delegated Authorization : Applicable to scenarios such as flight and hotel bookings, where users can preset time, amount, and merchant scope, and AI can monitor dynamics and automatically place orders offline.

For merchants, integrating AI-native applications only requires configuring a unified interface according to protocol standards, eliminating the need for separate complex API development, which can significantly reduce integration costs. 对于商家而言，接入 AI 原生应用只需按照协议标准配置统一接口，无需单独进行复杂的 API 开发，可大幅降低对接成本。

Previously, OpenAI partnered with Stripe to launch a protocol supporting ChatGPT checkout, and Google also released the Universal Commerce Protocol (UCP) for the entire AI shopping process. The payment link is becoming a focal point for global tech companies in deploying 'AI agent' services. 此前，OpenAI 曾联合 Stripe 推出协议支持 ChatGPT 结账，Google 也发布了 AI 购物全流程通用商务协议 UCP，支付环节正成为全球科技企业布局「AI 代办」服务的焦点。

item.title: 国产芯片全程训练，智谱 GLM-Image 登顶 Hugging Face Trending
item.guid: 国产芯片全程训练，智谱-GLM-Image-登顶-Hugging-Face-Trending
item.description:
Yesterday, Zhipu announced that its latest open-source multimodal model, GLM-Image, topped the Hugging Face Trending list less than 24 hours after its launch. 昨天，智谱宣布，其最新开源的多模态模型 GLM-Image 在 Hugging Face Trending 榜单上线不到 24 小时即登顶第一。

Zhipu emphasized that this is the first time a SOTA model, fully trained on domestic chips, has reached the top position on the international stage, marking a breakthrough in the end-to-end independent R&D capabilities of domestic AI models. 智谱强调，这是首次完全依托国产芯片完成全程训练的 SOTA 模型在国际舞台上取得榜首位置，标志着国产 AI 模型端到端自主研发能力实现突破。

During the training process, the team achieved full-process training and inference adaptation based on the Ascend Atlas 800T A2 chip and the MindSpore framework. The performance reached the hardware reporting limit, verifying the feasibility of training SOTA models on domestic computing power. 训练过程中，团队基于昇腾 Atlas 800T A2 芯片与昇思 MindSpore 框架实现了全流程训练与推理适配，性能达到硬件汇报上限，验证了在国产算力上训练 SOTA 模型的可行性。

The R&D goal of GLM-Image is to explore a new generation of 'cognitive generative' technology paradigm. Unlike common open-source LDM solutions, this model adopts a 'autoregressive + diffusion decoder' hybrid architecture, demonstrating superior generation effects in knowledge-intensive scenarios. GLM-Image 的研发目标是探索新一代「认知型生成」技术范式。不同于开源常见的 LDM 方案，该模型采用「自回归+扩散解码器」混合架构，在知识密集型场景下展现出更优生成效果。

In terms of performance, GLM-Image achieved first place in open-source rankings on both CVTG-2K (Complex Visual Text Generation) and LongText-Bench (Long Text Rendering) lists, especially excelling in Chinese character generation tasks, and can be widely applied in knowledge-intensive scenarios such as posters, PPTs, and popular science diagrams. 在性能表现方面，GLM-Image 在 CVTG-2K（复杂视觉文本生成）与 LongText-Bench（长文本渲染）榜单均获得开源第一，尤其在汉字生成任务中表现突出，可广泛应用于海报、PPT、科普图等知识密集型场景。

Currently, the model can be directly experienced on the Zhipu Qingyan App / web version and has been open-sourced on GitHub and Hugging Face. 目前，该模型可在智谱清言 App / 网页版直接体验，并已在 GitHub 和 Hugging Face 开源。

item.title: 美团发布首个开源「重思考」模型 LongCat-Flash-Thinking-2601
item.guid: 美团发布首个开源「重思考」模型-LongCat-Flash-Thinking-2601
item.description:
Yesterday, Meituan's LongCat team officially released and open-sourced the upgraded model LongCat-Flash-Thinking-2601. According to reports, this version has achieved SOTA (State-Of-The-Art) level among open-source models on core evaluation benchmarks such as agent search, tool invocation, and tool interaction reasoning. 昨天，美团旗下 LongCat 团队正式发布并开源升级版模型 LongCat-Flash-Thinking-2601。据介绍，这一版本在智能体搜索、工具调用及工具交互推理等核心评测基准上均达到开源模型的 SOTA 水平。

The biggest highlight of LongCat-Flash-Thinking-2601 is its generalization capability in tool invocation. Official tests show that in complex random tasks relying on tool invocation, the model's performance surpasses Claude, significantly reducing the training cost for adapting new tools. LongCat-Flash-Thinking-2601 最大亮点在于工具调用的泛化能力。官方测试显示，在依赖工具调用的复杂随机任务中，该模型性能超越了 Claude，可显著降低新工具适配训练成本。

At the same time, it has become the first fully open-sourced model that supports free online experience of the 'Re-thinking Mode'. This mode ensures more comprehensive decision-making in highly difficult problems through a two-step closed-loop iteration of parallel reasoning and summarization. 同时，它成为首个完整开源并支持在线免费体验「重思考模式」的模型。该模式通过并行推理与总结归纳两步闭环迭代，确保在高难度问题中实现更周全的决策。

Evaluation data shows that the model performs leadingly in dimensions such as programming, mathematical reasoning, tool invocation, and search. Experiments also indicate that with multi-environment reinforcement learning and noise injection training, the model maintains stable performance in complex scenarios and possesses strong environmental adaptability. 评测数据显示，该模型在编程、数学推理、工具调用和搜索等维度均表现领先。实验还表明，借助多环境强化学习与噪声注入训练，模型在复杂场景下保持稳定表现，具备强大的环境适应能力。

item.title: 春运坐火车不用自己拿行李了，中铁快运「轻装行」试点扩大到全国 111 个车站
item.guid: 春运坐火车不用自己拿行李了，中铁快运「轻装行」试点扩大到全国-111-个车站
item.description:
Recently, China Railway Express announced a further expansion of its 'Light Travel' service pilot program, adding 92 new stations including Harbin, Changchun, Tianjin, Shijiazhuang, Xi'an, Nanchang, Nanning, Urumqi, and Lhasa, bringing the total number of pilot stations to 111, covering all provincial capitals, municipalities directly under the central government, and cities with independent planning status. 近日，中铁快运宣布进一步扩大「轻装行」服务试点范围，新纳入哈尔滨、长春、天津、石家庄、西安、南昌、南宁、乌鲁木齐、拉萨等在内的 92 个车站，使试点总数达到 111 个，已覆盖全部省会城市、直辖市及计划单列市。

This expansion maintains the same service model. After successfully purchasing tickets, passengers can book luggage consignment services through the Railway 12306 App, WeChat Mini Program, and China Railway Express WeChat Mini Program. Billing is per item: 此次扩容保持了服务模式不变。旅客在成功购票后，可通过铁路 12306 App、微信小程序及中铁快运微信小程序预约行李托运服务。计费方式按件收取：

    'Origin to station' or 'station to destination' is 68 yuan/item;

    'Origin to the boarding platform' or 'boarding platform to destination' is 98 yuan/item.

At 6 stations including Beijing West, Beijing South, Guangzhou South, Shanghai, Shanghai Hongqiao, and Hangzhou East, business class passengers can enjoy luggage direct delivery service to the business class lounge, with the same fee of 98 yuan/item. 在北京西、北京南、广州南、上海、上海虹桥、杭州东 6 个车站，商务座旅客可享受行李直送至商务座候车厅的服务，费用同为 98 元/件。

China Railway Express stated that as the pilot operation matures, prices will be dynamically adjusted based on market demand and operating costs. 中铁快运表示，随着试点运营成熟，将根据市场需求及运营成本对价格进行动态调整。

item.title: 《暗黑新娘！》发布定档预告，3 月 6 日全国上映
item.guid: 《暗黑新娘！》发布定档预告，3-月-6-日全国上映
item.description:
Yesterday, the movie 'Dark Bride!' released its official trailer, confirming its theatrical release nationwide on March 6. 昨天，电影《暗黑新娘！》发布定档预告，确认将于 3 月 6 日在全国院线上映。

The film is directed by Maggie Gyllenhaal, starring newly crowned Golden Globe winner Jessie Buckley and Oscar winner Christian Bale. Official promotions position it as a fated love story that 'walks with death and keeps company with madness.' 影片由玛吉 · 吉伦哈尔执导，新晋金球奖影后杰西 · 巴克利与奥斯卡得主克里斯蒂安 · 贝尔主演，官方宣传将其定位为一段「与死亡同行、和疯狂作伴」的宿命式爱情故事。

item.title: 《藏地情书》定档情人节
item.description:
The contemporary Tibetan road romance film "Love Letter from Tibet" released its "Extreme Oxygen Heartbeat" version poster yesterday and confirmed its release on Valentine's Day, February 14th. 当代藏地公路爱情电影《藏地情书》昨日发布「极氧心动」版定档海报，并确认将于 2 月 14 日情人节上映。

The film is adapted from the best-selling book "Tibetan White Paper," and the real-life love story of the original couple has lasted for twenty-three years. The movie begins with financial engineer Mao Mingji (played by Qu Chuxiao) and foreign language university student Fu Zhen (played by Qiu Tian) meeting in Tibet, depicting their emotional evolution from subtle ambiguity to confronting true feelings during their brief journey. 影片改编自畅销书《藏地白皮书》，原型夫妇的真实爱情长跑已持续二十三年。电影以金融工程师毛铭基（屈楚萧 饰）与外国语大学学生傅真（邱天 饰）在西藏相遇为起点，呈现两人在短暂旅途中从暗涌暧昧到直面真心的情感变化。

item.title: One Fun Thing｜Nano Banana 的命名由来其实是产品经理自己的名字
item.guid: One-Fun-Thing｜Nano-Banana-的命名由来其实是产品经理自己的名字
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Google recently revealed that the naming of its popular image generation model, "Nano Banana," actually originated from a product manager's late-night whim. 据 Android Authority 报道，Google 近日披露，其广受欢迎的图像生成模型「Nano Banana」命名其实是源于一位产品经理在深夜的突发奇想。

The report points out that the incident dates back to July last year. At that time, the Google DeepMind team was eager to submit the model, originally codenamed Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, to the large model arena LMArena for anonymous testing. 报道指出，该事件追溯至去年 7 月。当时 Google DeepMind 团队正急于将原本代号为 Gemini 2.5 Flash Image 的模型提交至大模型竞技场 LMArena 进行匿名测试。

Lacking a public-facing codename, product manager Naina Raisinghani, after receiving an urgent request at 2:30 AM, combined her nickname "Naina Banana" with her friends' affectionate term for her small stature and love for computers, "Nano," to coin the name "Nano Banana," which was subsequently approved. 由于缺少一个面向公众的对外代号，产品经理 Naina Raisinghani 在凌晨 2:30 接到紧急需求后，将自己的昵称「Naina Banana」与朋友对其身材娇小且热爱电脑的称呼「Nano」相结合，以此拼凑出了「Nano Banana」这一名称并获得通过。

The model went live on LMArena in early August last year. With its excellent image editing capabilities and amusing name, Nano Banana quickly gained popularity on social media and topped global image editing charts. 该模型于去年 8 月初在 LMArena 上线。凭借出色的图像编辑能力以及充满趣味的命名，Nano Banana 迅速在社交媒体走红并登顶全球图像编辑排行榜。

Google subsequently officially adopted this "meme-ified" brand image in its product operations, introducing design elements such as a yellow run button and banana emojis in AI Studio. Google 随后在产品运营中正式采纳了这一「迷因化」的品牌形象，在 AI Studio 中引入了黄色运行按钮及香蕉表情符号等设计元素。

With the launch of Gemini 3 Pro Image, Google decided to continue this naming tradition, officially naming it "Nano Banana Pro." 随着 Gemini 3 Pro Image 的推出，Google 决定延续这一命名传统，将其正式命名为「Nano Banana Pro」。

item.title: 周末看什么｜《震耳欲聋》
item.description:
The realist crime film "Deafening" centers its narrative on anti-fraud cases involving deaf individuals, partly inspired by lawyer Zhang Qi's real-life professional experiences. 现实主义犯罪题材电影《震耳欲聋》以聋人反诈案件为核心叙事，部分取材自律师张琪的真实从业经历。

The story revolves around Li Qi, a young lawyer from a humble background. Although he is hearing, he grew up in a deaf family and is fluent in sign language. In his pursuit of fame and fortune, he becomes embroiled in a Ponzi scheme involving multiple deaf victims after receiving a plea for help from a deaf girl named Zhang Xiaorui. 故事围绕底层出身的年轻律师李淇展开。他虽为健听人，却成长于聋人家庭，精通手语。在追逐名利的过程中，他因聋人女孩张小蕊的求助，被卷入一场涉及多名聋人受害者的庞氏骗局。

As the investigation deepens, he realizes that the case involves a deeper chain of interests, and the true identity of successful entrepreneur Jin Songfeng gradually emerges. The film takes Li Qi's choice between desire and conscience as its main thread, presenting his journey from a morally ambiguous lawyer to self-redemption. 随着调查深入，他意识到案件背后牵涉更深层的利益链条，成功企业家金松峰的真实面目逐渐浮现。影片以李淇在欲望与良知之间的抉择为主线，呈现其从灰度律师走向自我救赎的过程。

On the Douban platform, "Deafening" received a score of 7.4 (from over 230,000 reviews), performing better than 85% of similar works in the drama category and 88% in the crime film category. 在豆瓣平台，《震耳欲聋》获得 7.4 分（23 万余人评价），在剧情片与犯罪片分类中分别好于 85% 与 88% 的同类作品。

item.title: 买书不读指南｜《生命的灿烂之书》：布鲁姆的小说宇宙最终章
item.guid: 买书不读指南｜《生命的灿烂之书》：布鲁姆的小说宇宙最终章
item.description:
"The Bright Book of Life" is literary critic Harold Bloom's late-life retrospective on novel reading, and his last critical work left to the world. 《生命的灿烂之书》是文学批评家哈罗德 · 布鲁姆在生命晚期完成的小说阅读回望，也是他留给世界的最后一部批评著作。

Bloom surveys four centuries of novel history, from "Don Quixote," "The Red and the Black," "Moby Dick," and "Les Misérables" to "To the Lighthouse" and "The Rings of Saturn," selecting 50 classic novels he believes are worth "reading again and again," forming a literary memoir with his characteristic critical acumen and profound reflection. 布鲁姆以四百年小说史为经纬，从《堂吉诃德》《红与黑》《白鲸》《悲惨世界》到《到灯塔去》《土星之环》，精选 50 部他认为值得「一读再读」的经典小说，以其一贯的批评锋芒与深情回望构成一部文学回忆录。

The book offers both a systematic review of the novel tradition and interspersed fragments of Bloom's personal reading history, giving the work both theoretical weight and personal warmth. 书中既有对小说传统的系统梳理，也穿插布鲁姆个人阅读史的片段，使这部作品兼具理论重量与私人温度。

item.title: 游戏推荐｜《PEAK》
item.description:
"PEAK" is a cooperative climbing game developed jointly by Aggro Crab and Landfall, built on the Unity engine, with a core narrative framework of "boy scouts surviving on a mysterious island and climbing to the summit after a plane crash." 《PEAK》是一款由 Aggro Crab 与 Landfall 联合开发、基于 Unity 引擎的合作向攀登游戏，以「坠机后的童子军在神秘岛屿求生并攀登至山顶」为核心叙事框架。

Players can complete climbing missions solo or cooperatively with up to 3 friends across 4 ecologically distinct zones. The map features a daily rotation mechanism, generating a new terrain layout every 24 hours. 玩家可单人或与至多 3 名好友协作，通过 4 个生态迥异的区域完成攀登任务。地图采用每日轮换机制，每 24 小时生成全新地形布局。

In terms of gameplay, "PEAK" emphasizes stamina management, environmental survival, and teamwork. Players must maintain their stamina amidst hunger, injuries, and environmental threats, and use tools like ropes, pitons, and backpacks to progress. 玩法层面，《PEAK》强调体力管理、环境生存与团队协作。玩家需在饥饿、受伤与环境威胁下保持体力，并利用绳索、岩钉、背包等工具推进进度。

The game received "Overwhelmingly Positive" overall reviews on Steam, with a Metacritic score of 82/100 and OpenCritic showing a 100% recommendation rate. Game Informer gave it 9/10, PC Gamer scored it 86/100, calling it a "carefully crafted cooperative experience." 游戏在 Steam 上获得「好评如潮」的整体评价，Metacritic 评分为 82/100，OpenCritic 显示 100% 推荐率。Game Informer 给出 9/10，PC Gamer 评分 86/100，并称其为「精心打造的合作体验」。

Currently, the game is on sale on the Steam platform, and can be added to your library for 20.46 yuan before January 20. 目前，游戏正在 Steam 平台上特价促销，1 月 20 日前 20.46 元即可入库。
